title: I haven’t seen Zed in over 100 games

replies.body: So you mean you had a wonderfull 100 games in a row ? :)
Feels bad you cant Ban on the new gamemode.

I dont play Zed at all and  i can see why people hate him but idk why hes perma banned when theres champions you cant even out play if you wanted to {{champion:91}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:84}}
popularity

With duskblade he had a point and click one shot combo. Which of course is what made old and current LB and rengar frustrating
R-W-E-ignite with an auto or 2 weaved in. All that in under a second and it didn't require the zed to land a Q. This kills most squishies except probs anivia.
This means his R never even proced so this combo is possible without it.

He needs power taken out of his E and autos and thrown into a reward for landing multiple Q's

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lcE6KBA6,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2018-09-04T20:50:17.478+0000)
>
> With duskblade he had a point and click one shot combo. Which of course is what made old and current LB and rengar frustrating
> R-W-E-ignite with an auto or 2 weaved in. All that in under a second and it didn't require the zed to land a Q. This kills most squishies except probs anivia.
> This means his R never even proced so this combo is possible without it.
> 
> He needs power taken out of his E and autos and thrown into a reward for landing multiple Q's

I mean yeah if you just stand there to get hit by 2 Es lol

Isn't hard to land 2 E's, and is near impossible to dodge his E.

Ult on top of you, immediately W then E. There's 2 point blank E's that you have no chance of avoiding unless you flash after he lands with R.

> [{quoted}](name=KrakenKnight,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lcE6KBA6,comment-id=0001000300000000,timestamp=2018-09-05T05:32:07.864+0000)
>
> Isn't hard to land 2 E's, and is near impossible to dodge his E.
> 
> Ult on top of you, immediately W then E. There's 2 point blank E's that you have no chance of avoiding unless you flash after he lands with R.

you're wrong, if he ulted you first his shadow would be away from you, and would never insta double E unless you ran back to his clone

the only way you'd get double E'd from the shadow is if he W ulted you and you haven't yet moved out of the shadow, stay stuck buddy.

L2 read. Hell you even quoted it.
He hits you with his own e and his w shadow
what dumb ass actually lets zed melee / stay next to him? LOL

babe, this combo takes under a second to deal it's damage. How do i know? If vel'koz dies b4 his E hits the ground, which takes 1 second then the E does nothing even if it hits.
Died to that combo, E landed on him and did nothing. So, I have less than a second to outrun someone who is faster than me at every stage of the game who just teleported to me point blank and killed me b4 my only hard CC could touch him

So there was no "letting him melee" . He was going to melee whether I let him or not, because I'd have to script to react fast enough if at all possible

hey if you're bad you're bad, At least I know I can outplay zed mid top jg adc and supp.

hope is lost for you i guess.

PS. even if you get ulted and he throws W E afterwards you literally have to be handicapped to stay in his SMALL E range afterwards it's about 2-3 steps, there's a reason why people say he needs a buff.
Aside from LB he has better poke than ask the others you listed

> [{quoted}](name=Sp33d Zer0,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lcE6KBA6,comment-id=00010004,timestamp=2018-09-05T02:25:35.385+0000)
>
> Aside from LB he has better poke than ask the others you listed

yeah but you can actually avoid Zed damage if the others click on you you just die a few times I lived from Zed all in because i dodged his Qs but if that was any of the others I cant out play it I just die
Learn there counter parts. lb for zed Tf for talon etc.
I dont see it either but then again I only play {{champion:39}}  and {{champion:105}} {{champion:7}}
as an {{champion:245}} mid main the champ always banned in my games is {{champion:7}}

http://na.op.gg/champion/statistics,https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/current/platinum/plus/detailed/, Because he is in the top ten most banned champions in the game man. Peopl dont ban champions out of if they are op they ban them because they are annoying to play against.
Wat?
